I have created this petition to make the effort to make living easier for animals, I have found many people have come to the conclusion that with so many people out there getting what really matters to them heard is almost impossible.

I don't see it in that way, I see life as many people with goals and with these goals and the correct intentions they will really make a difference.

The point of this potation is not to stop animal slaughter but to make it more bearable for the animals by:

- Having regular checks on UK slaughter houses throughout the year

- 24 hour CCTV footage of everything inside the slaughter houses

- Improving the conditions that these animals must live in.

I don't think anything should deserved to suffer especially in todays modern society as it's just not necessary anymore. Its our responsibility to make a change so I really hope you agree with this potation and sign it to improve the lives of many animals.

Thanks for reading.
